body.p: Born on June 9, 1836 in Nelson County. Teacher and farmer. Married to Mollie E. Pollock. Children included Hattie F., Charles P., Slaughter, Sarah F., Mollie L., and Johnnie E. Attended St. Maryâ€™s College in 1847. Taught school from 1848-1861. In May 1861, enlisted in Company C, First Mississippi Valley Infantry under Capt. C.P Ray. He was imprisoned in Murfreesboro. Worked as a recruiter in 1863. Returned to Kentucky in the spring of 1865.
